function taskReducer(tasks,action){console.log("taskreducer");switch(action.type){// eslint-disable-next-line no-lone-blocks
case"ADD_TASK":{return[...tasks,{title:action.title,description:action.description,completed:false,priority:action.priority,dueDate:action.dueDate}];}case"SET_TASK":{return action.payload;}case"SET_EDIT_TASK":{return tasks.map((task,index)=>{if(index===action.id){return{...task,...action.payload};}return task;});}case"EDIT_TASK":{return tasks.map((task,index)=>{if(index===action.id){return{...task,...action.payload};}return task;});}case"REMOVE_TASK":{return tasks.filter((task,index)=>index!==action.id);}case"MARK_DONE":{return tasks.map((task,index)=>{if(index===action.id){return{...task,completed:!task.completed};}return task;});}default:{throw Error("Unknown Action: "+action.type);}}}export default taskReducer;
